about_the_game:
One Day to Conquer the Realm

Team up with your friends and dive into this 8v8 multiplayer, fast-paced party game! Join forces with your fortress teammates to tackle unique challenges and activities over a 24-minute match that represents an entire day, complete with a dynamic day-and-night cycle.

Party Game

Each 24-minute match is packed with pulse-pounding activities, from protecting your fortress and gathering resources to sabotaging the enemy team. With all aspects of the game happening simultaneously, players must split their efforts, collaborate, and strategize to outplay their opponents.

Team-based PvP

Prestige is the ultimate measure of your team’s success. Your team earns Prestige by outshining the enemy fortress, and every action affects your standing. Victory, at its core, depends on teamwork!

Fortress Development

Gather essential resources by mining ores, chopping wood, and hunting wildlife. Use these materials to craft weapons and armor, prepare hearty meals, or build structures like lumber mills and mines to sustain your team. Trade surplus goods—or steal from your rivals—to gain the upper hand and keep your team one step ahead.

Key Features :

  • Dynamic gameplay: Balance multiple roles as you forge weapons, cook meals to boost morale, harvest resources, and defend your fortress. The variety of tasks ensures there’s always something to do, whether you’re on the front lines or behind the scenes.

  • Fortress development: Customize your fortress with upgrades that enhance its defensive and offensive capabilities. Will you focus on fortification, increased production, or economic dominance? The choice is yours, and every decision counts.

  • Random events: Unpredictable challenges like rampaging titans, storms that disrupt gameplay, or hostile invasions keep you on your toes. Adapt quickly or face the consequences!

  • Quests and challenges: Undertake exciting missions to gain prestige or acquire rare resources. From rescuing villagers to uncovering powerful artifacts, these quests can tip the scales in your favor.

  • Siege and infiltration mechanics: Take the fight to your opponents! Launch a siege to breach their fort’s defenses or send a stealthy infiltrator to steal their gold during the night.

  • Magical warfare: Harness the power of spells like blinding fog or freezing curses to turn the tide of battle. Unlock rare magical components to craft devastating abilities that cripple your foes.

  • Prestige-based economy: The kingdom rewards those who excel. Earn gold from the realm based on your prestige level, but remember that any failure or negligence could lower your standing and cost your team dearly.

  • Epic showdowns: Falling behind doesn’t mean the end. The "Trial by Fire" pits champions from each team in a duel, offering the disadvantaged side a chance to regain their footing and rewrite the outcome.

Unleash your creativity, outwit your opponents, and lead your team to glory. Fortress Warfare blends intense action with strategic depth, creating an unforgettable party game experience. Will your team rise as champions, or will your fortress crumble under pressure?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.8 Ghz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Hosting a game and Client on the same computer will double ram requirements. Also future releases may require more hard drive space.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.2 Ghz Quad Core CPU or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB Dedicated Memory
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Hosting a game and Client on the same computer will double ram requirements. Also future releases may require more hard drive space.

short_description: A 16-player first-person party game set in a medieval fantasy universe. Pledge allegiance to your fortress and conquer the realm through brutal and engaging activities against the opposing fortress.
